Original Text: Dans la Rome antique, les poètes professionnels étaient généralement parrainés par des mécènes, de riches partisans, notamment des nobles et des militaires. Par exemple, Gaius Maecenas (en français Mécène), ami de César Auguste, était un important mécène pour les poètes augustes, dont Horace et Virgile. Alors qu'Ovide, un poète bien établi, a été banni de Rome par le premier empereur romain Auguste. Sappho est une des rares femmes poétesse de l'antiquité grecque à avoir bénéficié d'une grande renommée.
Translated Text: In ancient Rome, professional poets were generally sponsored by patrons, rich supporters, including nobles and soldiers.For example, Gaius Maecenas (in French Mécène), friend of César Auguste, was an important patron for Augustes poets, including Horace and Virgile.While Ovide, a well -established poet, was banished from Rome by the first Roman emperor Auguste.Sappho is one of the few women poets of Greek antiquity to have benefited from great renown.

Original Text: In ancient Rome, professional poets were generally sponsored by patrons, rich supporters, including nobles and soldiers.For example, Gaius Maecenas (in French Mécène), friend of César Auguste, was an important patron for Augustes poets, including Horace and Virgile.While Ovide, a well -established poet, was banished from Rome by the first Roman emperor Auguste.Sappho is one of the few women poets of Greek antiquity to have benefited from great renown.
Translated Text: Nell'antica Roma, i poeti professionisti furono generalmente sponsorizzati da mecenati, ricchi sostenitori, tra cui nobili e soldati. Ad esempio, Gaius Maecenas (in francese Mécène), amico di César Auguste, era un importante mecenate per i poeti di Augustes, tra cui Horace e Virgile.Ovide, un poeta ben consolidato, è stato bandito da Roma dal primo imperatore romano Auguste.Sappho è una delle poche poeti di antichità greca ad aver beneficiato di una grande fama.

Original Text: Nell'antica Roma, i poeti professionisti furono generalmente sponsorizzati da mecenati, ricchi sostenitori, tra cui nobili e soldati. Ad esempio, Gaius Maecenas (in francese Mécène), amico di César Auguste, era un importante mecenate per i poeti di Augustes, tra cui Horace e Virgile.Ovide, un poeta ben consolidato, è stato bandito da Roma dal primo imperatore romano Auguste.Sappho è una delle poche poeti di antichità greca ad aver beneficiato di una grande fama.
Translated Text: في روما القديمة ، كان الشعراء المحترفين برعاية رعاة ، أنصار الأثرياء ، بمن فيهم النبلاء والجنود.على سبيل المثال ، كان Gaius Macenas (باللغة الفرنسية Mécène) ، صديق César Augustte ، راعيًا مهمًا لشعراء Augustes ، بما في ذلك Horace و Virgile.ovide ، وهو شاعر موزّز جيدًا ، تم حظره من روما من قبل الإمبراطور الروماني الأول أوغستا. Sappho هو واحد من الشعراء القلائل من العصور القديمة اليونانية الذين استفادوا من شهرة كبيرة.
